content: **this pattern is also available in ** danish 1 swedish 2 german 3 wonderland wrap is designed by the talented supercutedesign/jennifer santos two skeins of twister or sultan deluxe in the same color are used for the project you can choose the color you like best but can also let yourself be inspired by the color combinations we have used you ll find them in the menu below as color 1 color 2 color 3 color 4 and color 5 1 https //hobbii dk/wonderland-wrap utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/jennifer-santos&utm_content=wonderland-wrap+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 2 https //hobbii se/wonderland-wrap utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/jennifer-santos&utm_content=wonderland-wrap+hbtrack&utm_term=karen 3 https //hobbii de/wonderland-wrap utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern/jennifer-santos&utm_content=wonderland-wrap+hbtrack&utm_term=karen
